definition: to make a copy/to plagiarize/to search and seize/to raid/to grab/to go off with/to take a shortcut/to make a turning move/to fold one's arms
to prepare a crib sheet/to crib/to cheat by copying
erhua variant of 小抄[xiao3 chao1]

sentences.english: Oh, let me guess. You were cramming for the test or busy with the crib sheet?
sentences.chinese: 我猜猜。你昨天是为考试熬夜还是忙着做小抄？

sentences.english: Paul tried to cheat on his test by sneaking in a crib card.
sentences.chinese: 保罗想在考试中夹带小抄作弊。

sentences.english: And some how get access to it, during the test.
sentences.chinese: 然后是怎样在考试中使用小抄。

sentences.english: I think we can bring a cheat sheet with us。
sentences.chinese: 我想我们是可以带一张小抄的。

sentences.english: Jean: Oh, let me guess. You were cramming for the test or busy with the crib sheet?
sentences.chinese: 我猜猜。你昨天是为考试熬夜还是忙着做小抄？

sentences.english: He doesn't play fair in the exam by bringing notes with him.
sentences.chinese: 他在考试中夹带小抄，对其他学生来说很不公平。

sentences.english: Look at my hand. - You have the answers written there?
sentences.chinese: 看我的手，你手上有写小抄吗？

sentences.english: Bring cheat sheet from Quiz 1, plus another single-page, double-sided cheat sheet.
sentences.chinese: 携带测验1的小抄，加上另一页双面的小抄。

sentences.english: Bring cheat sheet from Quiz 1, plus another single-page, double-sided cheat sheet.
sentences.chinese: 携带测验1的小抄，加上另一页双面的小抄。

sentences.english: Guidance by paper is a crutch that prevents you from making the best emotional connection with your audience.
sentences.chinese: 上台使用小抄，将无法使你与你的观众做情绪的连结。

definition: to reprint (a book etc) in a smaller format
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]
Introduction to Maoism (subject)/abbr. for 毛澤東思想概論|毛泽东思想概论[Mao2 Ze2 dong1 Si1 xiang3 Gai4 lun4]
to hand in one's examination script
to take a test or exam for sb
